title: Hellhound
summaries: The Hellhound is a Hardmode, post-Plantera enemy that starts to spawn beginning with wave 3 of the Pumpkin Moon event. Hellhounds follow the Unicorn AI and will run quite fast at the player; the player will be barely able to outrun them with boots or similar movement accessories, thus attacking them while out of their reach is important while fighting them.
Killing a Hellhound during the Pumpkin Moon event will add (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 5 / 10 / 15 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 4 points to the final score.
The Hellhound requires 100 kills to be awarded completion of its <linked>Bestiary</linked> entry and corresponding <linked>banner</linked>, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
